As a OpenTracing specification consule member, no such thing called opentracing protocol or format. So I don't know you could or not.
@zhaoyuguang I move zookeeper from `NoSQL` group to `distributed coordination` group. I think this should make sense. I am going to merge this after CI passed.

> @zhaoyuguang I move zookeeper from `NoSQL` group to `distributed coordination` group. I think this should make sense. I am going to merge this after CI passed.

It looks better
I prefer putting the zookeeper plugin into optional plugin, because of there are useless traces(heart beat) will be generate in cloud environment.

- 7 `DataCarrier.INDICATOR_L1_AGGREGATION`s
- 1 `DataCarrier.INDICATOR_L2_AGGREGATION`

Is there any document for upgrade?
here is my upgrade procedure for upgrading from 6.0.0-beta to 6.0.0-GA(it may not be the best practice)
1: stop all backend servers
2: delete all old indexes of sw(you can delete all indexes that starting with the value of storage.elasticsearch.nameSpace)
3: upgrade all backend servers
4: upgrade all agent and restart all application that start with javaagent (I used sw for java app)
5: start all backend servers
